scenario_text.value:
That you, Takuma? How’s it going? You find
Aoi?

Nah. To be honest, I wasn’t expecting her to
be so close by.
And I don’t sense Labramon either!
Haha, yeah, that figures.

(He made that sound pretty lighthearted, but
I know Minoru’s gotta be worried.)

(The more anxious he’s feeling, the more
Minoru tries to be upbeat and joke around.)
Don’t worry, Minoru, we’ll find Aoi.

’Course we will! Though to be honest, at
first I wasn’t so sure.

You know... When you said we should look for
Aoi a bit longer, I was really relieved.

(Sounds like me and Minoru are on the same
page then.)

Hey, what’s with that look? Don’t tell me
you’re surprised I’d feel that way!
(Erk, he got me!)

(But how should I respond? Knowing Minoru, I
doubt he’d be upset if I told him the truth,)

(but it might still hurt his feelings. Maybe
it’d be better if I denied it.)
(How should I respond to Minoru?)
Come clean.
Deny it.
Come clean.

To be honest, I was a little surprised to
hear you felt that way.

I thought you’d be more in agreement with the
professor.
Yeah, I get it.

And I’d be lying if I said I didn’t agree
with the professor at all.
Really?

Sure. I mean, with the fog closing in, it’s
hard to know what’ll happen with Miyuki.

And to be completely honest, what I want more
than anything is just to get back home.
Minoru...

But it’s funny, the more I talk with everyone
else, the less I feel that way.

It really makes me start to think we gotta go
out there and save Aoi, no matter what.

I don’t know, maybe that’s a sign I’m making
progress.

Definitely. I think you’ve gotten a lot
better at facing your worst fears.

Heh... Gotta admit, it’s weird having you say
that to my face, but it’s not a bad feeling.
Deny it.

No, no, not what I was thinking at all!
I know how much you care about everyone!
Hmm, sounds fishy to me.
No, really! I mean it!
All right, forget I said anything.

What really gets me, though, is thinking how
things might have been different.

Saki would’ve been the first to say something
in that situation. Sucks that she’s gone.

Yeah. That’s why I don’t want to lose anybody
else...

Seriously, man. We need a one-two punch: find
Aoi, then get Miyuki back.

Enemies may be lurking in the forest. We have
to be on our guard.
I got it, already.
Later, we’re gonna go check out the dam.
Got it. You both watch yourselves out there!
See you later!

Me and Falcomon are gonna go check out the
dam.

Don’t go getting into trouble while we’re
gone!
